str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To begin. Middle voice of archo; to commence.
To curse, invoke curses, devote to destruction. From anathema; to declare or vow under penalty of execration.
A prolonged form of a primary, but obsolete omo, for which another prolonged form omoo is used in certain tenses; to swear, i.e. Take oath.

parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular

str2: A man, one of the human race. From aner and ops; man-faced, i.e. A human being.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Accusative Masculine Singular
Verb - Present Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.
